title: Trump gets a UN resolution for his Gaza plan. What it means.
shortDescription: Trump described the vote as "a moment of true Historic proportion." The meaning of the UN vote is less clear.

title: Congress to vote on releasing more Epstein files. Live updates
shortDescription: President Trump has indicated he would sign a bill directing the Justice Department to release more files about the late Jeffrey Epstein.

title: Daily Briefing: House Epstein vote
shortDescription: Vote comes after Trump publicly endorsed the move. Here is the news to know on Tuesday.

title: NY Dems and GOP blast New York Power Authority over $7.5M plane
shortDescription: Top Democrats and Republicans in the New York Legislature think the NY Power Authority should stop flying execs across the state in a private plane.

title: Has Mamdani given Democrats their mojo back? | The Excerpt
shortDescription: New York City Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani’s campaign centered on the issue of affordability. That resonated with young voters.

title: Special sauce: Trump leans on love of McDonald's to tout affordability
shortDescription: Trump sought to highlight his own attempts at reining in inflation and highlighting his love for McDonald's, a working class staple

title: House plans to vote Tuesday on releasing Epstein files. What to know.
shortDescription: The House is expected to vote on a measure on Nov. 18 that would force the Justice Department to release all of its records on Jeffrey Epstein.

title: UN backs Trump’s Gaza peace plan
shortDescription: The U.N. Security Council passed the U.S resolution supporting President Donald Trump’s Gaza peace plan.

title: 'It's a little early': President Trump reacts to possible Ted Cruz White House bid
shortDescription: Trump is constitutionally prohibited from seeking a third presidential term, though he has repeatedly expressed an interest in serving beyond 2028 .

title: UN Security Council adopts US resolution on Trump's Gaza plan
shortDescription: The UN resolution is seen as vital to legitimizing a transitional governing body and reassuring countries that are considering sending troops to Gaza.

title: Mamdani's transition committee raises $1 million in under 10 days
shortDescription: Mamdani mania continues as New York City's mayor-elect's transition team says it has raised more than $1 million from mostly small-dollar donors.

title: 'I blew my stack': Trump explains how his voice became hoarse
shortDescription: A raspy-sounding Donald Trump said he doesn't have a cold but instead developed a hoarse voice from shouting at foreign leaders over trade.

title: Trump says he would sign bill requiring release of Epstein files
shortDescription: President Trump said he would sign a bill requiring the Justice Department to fully release the files connected to the Jeffrey Epstein investigation.

title: Trump says he would sign the Epstein files bill
shortDescription: "Sure I would." President Donald Trump says he would sign the Epstein files bill if it passes the House and Senate.

title: The House's vote on releasing Epstein files
shortDescription: The House will soon vote on releasing files on Jeffrey Epstein. This is what could happen following the vote.

title: Trump can't withhold University of California funding, judge rules
shortDescription: In a Nov. 14 ruling, a judge said the Trump administration had "engaged in coercive and retaliatory conduct in violation of the First Amendment."

title: Eric Trump reveals Barron Trump's inauguration comment to Joe Biden
shortDescription: Trump's youngest is a bit of a mystery. A handshake with Biden at inauguration spurred many theories. Here’s what Barron said, according to Eric Trump

title: Nicki Minaj teams up with Donald Trump's UN ambassador. Here's why.
shortDescription: Rejected by some in the rap industry in recent years, Nicki Minaj – the genre's most famous woman – has embraced insiders in the Trump administration.
